name: Roomba May Cry
description:
­

Roomba service at a hotel should not be this difficult!

Those messy humans should do the job on their own.

At least I'm getting paid at the end of the day.

"paid", huh

Made in 9 days for the jam "Game Jaaj 6" on the theme "cycles" 

A game by:

Haru (Vand™) - Programmer Sound Designer
Sarah Cerveira - 2D Artist
Julio Pagani - Producer
Andre Traverso - Level Designer, 2D Artist
Augusto Vedana - Sound Designer, Musicist
